chunks.chunk_text: That's a good guess.But it turns out it's pretty much balance between guys and girls.Almost a 50-50 slip.Almost 50-50.Oh, okay.That's interesting.Another interesting fact you might want to know is about user's age.I was originally thinking those people are smart and good at doing the price comparison.They must be young generation.But it's not.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: No way.It doesn't make sense.They should know K-pop.They are the people who...Okay.So price-conscious shoppers,right?People in their middle age,they've got disposable income,but they are slightly more price-conscious than other demographics.So it's me.It's me they're targeting.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: Be loyal,Kupeng.Send some media spend this way.Help you retain some of the old people.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: But I would say that's also an interesting point that we might follow up at the end.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: Because you know like even younger people,they are more tend to shop online.But you know like people who is older,they are spending power.Usually it's higher than younger people.So I am really interesting to know that if currently their user,it's more like older than other platform.So will it impact their revenue or sales?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: But in the age of demographics,there's revenge spending.Literally,you never know.You know like you said the oldies have more disposable income.If Kupeng is the next cool thing,why not?Very,very interesting stats there.Thank you very much Lydia for sharing that.So my turn.Let me quickly chime in with some interesting stuff.So my part,what caught my eye with their earnings call was one of their recent strategic acquisitions.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: Luxury brand.And when I say acquire luxury brand,I'm not saying luxury brand as in LVMH or any of those companies.No,they acquired a luxury e-commerce site.And this name,you guys have heard it for a long time.It's Farfetch.So they acquired Farfetch for a $500 million investment.Huge,humongous.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: All right,I don't know where they get the money,but $500 million today is also have a $500 million is aka half a billion dollars.All right,ladies and gentlemen,that's not small money.That's quite a big money.And they acquired Farfetch.I've seen Farfetch and I've known them for a long time.My wife browses them like all the time.For price references,you always go to Farfetch for luxury goods.You go to Farfetch.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: You can always do your price referencing there.And of course,if you want to find the latest stuff,you go to Farfetch.Yeah,instead of browsing,going to LV catalog,whatever,go to Farfetch.You will do okay.So this is their acquisition.If Kubang has this category expanded in their site,I think it will bring in some of the demographics that Lydia earlier mentioned.The 45 or the 35 plusses,right,with very
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: very high disposable income.The ultra high net worth people,that's 40,you know,35 plus that goes beyond 60.So they would probably want to buy their fancy luxury bags,shoes,accessories from Kubang.So this is something definitely to look out for Farfetch.Yes,right now we are still not really sure how they want to introduce lottery category to their platform.But I would say that's something we all can pay attention to.But
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: definitely,if we use any of the car brands,let's talk about VW,right?You have VW,like Kubang,the main business.And then you have Porsche,that's also under VW.You have Farfetch under Kubang.So they can definitely branch out.They don't have to be one single brand.But in terms of operations and logistics,they can create the synergy between the different brands.So it probably doesn't mean
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: that Kubang will now open up and start selling a lot of luxury brands and then Farfetch will disappear.It will probably coexist.They will find their own value propositions and different user demographics and they would target them accordingly,you know,so as to split them and provide better services that.So I think they will coexist.And that's how Amazon did it back in the day too,right?They started from books and CDs.And then they started expanding into different product categories by through acquisition.And that's how they grew
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: over time.However,as they grew,what became their bread and butter was actually the logistics operation,their software operations,the server side,the data centers,the infrastructural side of things.That became their real core competitiveness.However,for most of these e-commerce sites right now,you know,retail is nice.Retail makes money.However,the real long-term competitiveness,if you're looking at sustainable business,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: you gotta go infrastructure,the logistics that you build,the services that you build,and of course on top of your retail prowess.I think Kubang definitely has taken a lot of the plays from the Amazon playbook from before.And I think e-commerce platforms,I mean,you can,you've got so many giants to learn from really.You can look at Alibaba,Timu,Xien,Amazon,and you pick a few playbooks that fits your country.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: Fits your region.Fits your strategy.And I think we will see high-growth unicorns very quickly these days,because,you know,if you learn from the best,you become the best.So to give everybody a recap on their earnings call pertaining to Taiwan side of things,Kubang said,reported that the growth in Taiwan has been faster than what is expected in Korea during the initial stages.So they compared notes with how they developed in Korea,and they said growth in Taiwan is much
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: much faster than in Korea.In just the last two quarters alone,active customers and revenues in Taiwan doubled,demonstrating strong momentum and positive reception of Kubang's offering in the region.And obviously,Kubang is going to leverage its expertise,processes,and infrastructure from what they learned in Korea to accelerate the growth in Taiwan.This includes selection optimization,supply chain management,and technology development.And then next,in terms of profitability,they
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: continue to say that they expect Taiwan business,Taiwan Kubang,to reach profitability faster than Korea.So in the growth phases.So they're really going to look for this.I think this is their first milestone,to reach profitability in Taiwan region first.And leveraging its existing technology,learnings,and processes,Kubang is going to optimize its operations and drive efficiencies in Taiwan.And that's what they're going to do in the coming year,I believe.And then in terms of market
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: opportunity,they said Taiwan is a very attractive market with significant growth potential.So although they've seen some initial success the last year,they believe it's still in the early stages of tapping into the market's full potential.So like you said,the whole,you know,from the stats,they're still very novel,all right,and also Taiwan e-commerce market share is,has still room to grow.So they obviously see Taiwan as a very good stepping stone.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: And if we go back and think about what happened last year,they withdrew from Japan overall.So I think that focused strategy to focus on Taiwan as their next market to tackle,I think that's pretty smart,because whatever we enjoy buying will spill over and we can influence Singaporeans,we can influence the Hong Kongese,and we can influence Malaysia and Indonesia.Because a lot of the overseas Chinese and the,you know,the Chinese population overseas
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json

chunks.chunk_text: as well.So in Taiwan,we still have,we have that cultural edge.Whatever is cool for the Taiwan people,we tend to also share it with the rest of the overseas Chinese globally.And guys,if you are interested in more stats and research around digital marketing and e-commerce related topics,please do send us a comment or an email at ask15mins at gmail.com or you are welcome to send us a DM
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.221_ 電商學英語 - Coupang在台有沒有站穩呀競爭才有消費者福利 Coupangs Q1 2024 earning.json
